extendedInfo.description: Incredibly simple, yet very useful compass app with great-looking graphics!

reviews.title: A Dildo Compass
reviews.comment: It isn\'t accurate enough to replace the real thing. West is North and sometimes East. If you know which is which, it\'s only so good. If I knew what to do to make it work better, such as activating the GPS, I would.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really simple compass, works great and, as far as I see, is accurate. Good download if all you need is a simple compass. HTC Desire HD.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So smooth compass
reviews.comment: I love this compass since it is simple and nicely smooth move like a real compass!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Exact, clearest, sharp, smoothest n live, what do u want more! Developer, u can merge it with with more, like alto, hygro, thermo,.. But this compas is just perfect, no risk of breakin dwn no repare. Thank you!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not tiny. But great.
reviews.comment: No frills great looking & simple compass. Great app for those into cartography or field engineering jobs.
reviews.author: Abhirup Chaudhuri

reviews.comment: Love the smoothness and interface. Just needs to be a little more accurate. Also other features such as themes like digital compass as well as usinf current locarion wont hurt as the other compass apps. What makes this stand out is the smoothness
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: RAZR M
reviews.comment: this app sucks big time! every single time I point to be true north, it\'s fails in ceases. I uninstalled within 5 minutes after installing. is there such a thing as negative 3 stars?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app. Very nice compass. Reliable & versatile. Thanks.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: Works perfectly (with a properly calibrated phone) and it\'s beautiful. The simplicity is highly appreciated, but the ads take away its elegance.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So useful
reviews.comment: I\'m backpacking and i\'m in a different city every few weeks. This app has saved my butt!  It\'s never pointed me in the wrong direction. I read some other reviews and it sounds like people don\'t know how to read a compass. I don\'t know where I\'d be without it ;) yes that was a compass app pun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: weak! constantly says I\'m pointing NE regardless which way it points. deleted. samsung galaxy s.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love it! Simple yet useful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Astounding
reviews.comment: Simple but powerful... Great quality... I have checked many times it never fails. another great app after tiny flash led
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brill bit of kit!
reviews.comment: Easy to instal and easy to read! Every disabled sports person should have one. Unless they are playing chess!!
reviews.author: christopher evans

reviews.title: Why isn\'t this standard?
reviews.comment: Well done! Currently using it to see where the sun will rise and fall in search for a brighter appartment.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice lookng cmpss!!
reviews.comment: Can\'t really say mch 4its accuracy. It has no Settings 4magnetic, or True North 2cmpare. But itz pretty mch withn range w/ my GPS cmpss.  Verdict: Very nice \'n funct\'nal 4wht it is. It is wht it is!! TengQ developrs.
reviews.author: Taeki Li

reviews.comment: I am a litl confused about this compass...maybe I just cant use a compass bt im sure it never points north...id b lost with this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: It would be nice if the compass had second needle so it could be lock down so you can follow yourself back home. Some compass\'s have them install on them. I one like that and it was sweet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great little app
reviews.comment: Works just fine. Align N with red arrow for analog or point the top of your phone in desired direction and get digital readout. Jeez.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fake app
reviews.comment: Developer has Just added a picture of compass ,needle doesn\'t moves it remains idle all the time ..
reviews.author: Nisha Yadav
